00028 void eqFileOp::extract (const char* sourceDir, const char* destinationDir, const char* type1, const char* type2)
00029 {
00030         DIR *dp;
00031         
00032         string destDir = destinationDir;
00033         //dirPath deki bosluklari temizle
00034         string dirPath = sourceDir;
00035         string newPath = "";
00036         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < dirPath.length(); i++)
00037         {
00038                 if (sourceDir[i] == ' ')
00039                 {
00040                          newPath += "\\ ";
00041                 }
00042                 else
00043                 {
00044                         newPath += sourceDir[i];
00045                 }
00046         }
00047         //cout << newPath << endl;
00048         
00049         dp = opendir (sourceDir); 
00050         if (dp != NULL)
00051         {
00052                 string searchPattern = "*";
00053                 if (type1 != NULL)
00054                 {
00055                         searchPattern += ".";
00056                         searchPattern.append(type1);
00057                 }
00058                 if (type2 != NULL)
00059                 {
00060                         searchPattern += ".";
00061                         searchPattern.append(type2);
00062                 }
00063                 searchPattern += "*.zip";
00064                 
00065                 string unzipCommand = "find " + newPath + "/ -name '" + searchPattern + "' -exec unzip -o -d " + destDir +" {} \\; >/dev/null";
00066                 //cout << unzipCommand << endl;
00067                 system(unzipCommand.c_str()); //c_str() string i char* a cevirir.
00068                 
00069                 (void) closedir (dp);
00070         }
00071         else
00072                 perror ("Couldn't open the directory");
00073 }

00079 string* eqFileOp::listFiles (const char* sourceDir, const char* type1, const char* type2, int& numberOfElements)
00080 {
00081         string* fileList;
00082         string dirPath = sourceDir;
00083         string newPath = "";
00084         string type1Str, type2Str;
00085         
00086         if (type1 != NULL)
00087                 type1Str = type1;
00088         if (type2 != NULL)
00089                 type2Str = type2;

00091

00094         {
00095                 if (sourceDir[i] == ' ')
00096                 {
00097                          newPath += "\\ ";

00113                 }
